articles.content:

articles.title: NASA's Artemis I mega moon rocket's next prelaunch test attempt begins Tuesday - CNN
articles.description: NASA's Artemis I mission to the moon will make a fourth attempt at its most critical and final prelaunch test beginning on Tuesday, according to the agency.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Neptune just experienced an unexplained temperature shift - CNN
articles.description: Astronomers observing Neptune for the past 17 years tracked a surprising drop in the ice giant's global temperatures, which was then followed by a dramatic warming trend at the planet's south pole.

articles.description: The far side of the moon, which we can never see from our vantage point on Earth, looks surprisingly different than the orb we're used to seeing in the night sky. A new study offers an explanation.

articles.title: NASA's SpaceX Crew-3 Astronauts to Discuss Mission, Splashdown - NASA
articles.description: As they prepare to return to Earth later this month, NASA’s SpaceX Crew-3 astronauts will answer media questions about their time aboard the International Space Station during an in-orbit news conference at 1:20 p.m. EDT Friday, April 15.
